channel.title: Blogs on Isaac
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Isaac

item.title: New Portfolio Website
item.description: New Website With the end of my studies in Polytechnic, I have decided to create a new portfolio website! I utilized Wix for my previous portfolio website. However, I wish to test out the skills I have learn in school. Therefore, I chose to create a new portfolio website which was hosted on git. Intially I considered using HTML, CSS and Javascript to create my own website. However, I eventually decided against it as I wish to include blogging features into the website.
